remarks: An element of the (base set of the) ` ZZ `-module ` ZZ X. ZZ ` . (Contributed by AV, 21-May-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 10-Jun-2019.)
statement:
zlmodzxz.z $e |- Z = ( ZZring freeLMod { 0 , 1 } ) $.
zlmodzxzel $p |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> { <. 0 , A >. , <. 1 , B >. } e. ( Base ` Z ) ) $.
